name: Elfie Murderino
description:
Story

Elfie is tired of being Santa's slave. Elfie is tired of the endless piles of toys for all the snotty kids that somehow managed to get on Santa's "nice" list.
The rules of Santa's Workshop are clear: if you try to escape, you will be captured... dead or... dead.

Gameplay

- The goal of the player is to escape Santa's Workshop in the least amount of time possible and without losing lives
- Pass through the army of Nutcrackers and Furbies, don't get caught on the sticky candies, and most importantly... don't get fried by Santa's lasers!

Controls

- WASD to move Elfie around the maps
- Or you can just use the arrow keys to move Elfie around

Credits Programming

UmaArvore / João Vaz

Art

Lotty1 / Anni Paz

Music

Theme song: "Scary Christmas" by CloudSystem
Level music: "Krampus Workshop" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

 
The laser light is done with the package "volumetric lines" from "Johannes Unterguggenberger"
